plan.name: rc1-btcstake-v1
plan.info: Add x/btcstake store key (IBC WBTC staking + uretro rewards)

title: RC1: Enable BTC staking (EDIT HEIGHT)
summary: Adds the x/btcstake store key via the rc1-btcstake-v1 upgrade so users can stake the configured IBC WBTC denom and earn uretro rewards. NOTE: Edit the upgrade height before submitting.
